text: @SethAbramson 115,000 REPORTED Covid19 fatalities in the US - In just four months! Each soul lost was someone’s mother or father, sister or brother, husband or wife, best friend or neighbor. And fucking *crickets* from Trump. Where is the outrage?! I feel like I’m screaming into a vacuum.
